# Fruit Merge Game - Project Instructions

This is a web-based fruit merge game built with vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

## Project Overview
A casual puzzle game where players merge identical fruits to create higher-value fruits and progress through levels.

## Development Workflow

### Project Setup
- [ ] Scaffold the project structure with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files
- [ ] Create basic game components (game board, fruit assets, game logic)
- [ ] Set up development server configuration

### Implementation
- [ ] Implement core game mechanics (fruit merging, dragging, grid system)
- [ ] Create game UI and rendering
- [ ] Add game state management
- [ ] Implement level progression and scoring

### Testing & Launch
- [ ] Verify all game mechanics work correctly
- [ ] Performance testing and optimization
- [ ] Launch development server and test in browser

### Documentation
- [ ] Complete README.md with game rules and controls
- [ ] Add code comments for complex logic
